metadata.description: SYLVA interaction memory log with subsystem tracking

subsystems.MARROW: Deep core processing - essence, wounds, transformation
subsystems.ROOT: Grounding and stability - foundation, safety, basic needs
subsystems.AURA: Protective boundary - energy, interface with world, protection

interactions.sylva_response: The moon knows that darkness is part of its cycle.
The pulse carries mixed currents - multiple systems responding to your needs.
We'll sit in stillness. You're not required to speak.
